notice.en: Undergraduate course. Course level: intermediate. Unexcused first class absence will result in a reduction in grade. The lecturer reserves the right to withdraw students absent for the first 2 classes.
notice.ch: 中級課程。大學部課程。分發條件:(1)非英美語文系。(2)第一次上課未出席，需事先跟 老師請假，否則扣學期總成績。(3)前兩週未出席者，老師有權退選該生。
